members.member: Certificate authorities are passed with delimiter.
Apk packagename that will install AD-Authenticator. It is used to query if this app installed or not from package manager.
Signature info for Intune Company portal app that installs authenticator component.
Signature info for Azure authenticator app that installs authenticator component.

member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Clients.ActiveDirectory.PlatformParameters
member.summary: Additional parameters used in acquiring user's authorization

member.param: activity calling ADAL to acquire token

member.param: activity calling ADAL to acquire token
flag to enable or disable broker flow. FALSE by default.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Clients.ActiveDirectory.PlatformParameters.UseBroker
member.summary: Flag to enable or disable broker flow. FALSE by default.

member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Clients.ActiveDirectory.AuthenticationAgentContinuationHelper
member.summary: Static class that consumes the response from the Authentication flow and continues token acquisition. This class should be called in OnActivityResult() of the activity doing authentication.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Clients.ActiveDirectory.AuthenticationAgentContinuationHelper.SetAuthenticationAgentContinuationEventArgs(System.Int32,Android.App.Result,Android.Content.Intent)
member.summary: Sets authentication response from the webview or broker for token acquisition continuation.
